post: Why do you say that? Fred Zugibe, Rockland County, NY, medical examiner for 30 years, doesn’t think so. In fact, he is certain that the man was in full rigor and that the bloodstains are definitively post mortem. He has studied the Shroud extensively and published books and papers on the subject..
title: Barrie Schwartz on the Shroud of Turin
